name: Restitched
storyline:
Restitched follows the story of a brave, adventurous teddy bear named Stuffy on a journey to find their roots. Along the way, Stuffy must 'restitch' a community unraveled by corporate greed and tyranny while discovering new friends, new foes, and new locations.
Embark on an adventure with your new plush companion as you venture through new themes, meet new friends, and encounter new obstacles. This platforming adventure sees Stuffy searching for answers while "restitching" an unraveled community along the way.
summary: A 2.5D puzzle-platformer featuring a robust level editor, expansive character customization, an engaging story mode, and a charming crafty aesthetic.
